sentences.english: Besides , CT is insentive to corpus callosum infarction.
sentences.chinese: 另外CT对胼胝体梗死不敏感。

sentences.english: Brain magnetic resonance imaging revealed hypoplasia of corpus callosum.
sentences.chinese: 脑部核磁共显示胼胝体发育不良。

sentences.english: There was no abnormal lesion of corpus callosum on CT images.
sentences.chinese: CT扫描胼胝体区均未见异常密度灶。

sentences.english: Callose stains are aniline blue, resorcin blue and rosolic acid.
sentences.chinese: 胼胝质的染剂是苯胺蓝，间苯二酚蓝和玫红酸。

sentences.english: The wall of the generative cell contains callose.
sentences.chinese: 生殖细胞壁为胼胝质成分。

sentences.english: This condition is seen commonly with agenesis of the corpus callosum and does not respond to ventricular shunting .
sentences.chinese: 这种情况常见于胼胝体发育不全，且不引起脑室分流。

sentences.english: First of all, if there is any callus you can excise it.
sentences.chinese: 首先，是否有可以切除的胼胝。

sentences.english: Hypertension and diabetes are high risk factors of callosum infarction.
sentences.chinese: 高血压和糖尿病是胼胝体卒中的高危因素。

sentences.english: MRI and enhanced MRI were highly sensitive to corpus callosal infarction.
sentences.chinese: MRI平扫及增强对胼胝体梗死具有较高的敏感性。

sentences.english: The MRI manifestation of agenesis of the corpus callosum in 6 cases was analysed.
sentences.chinese: 对6例胼胝体发育不全的MRI表现进行了分析。

sentences.english: But the side walls usually lacked callose.
Objective To study the clinical value of MRI diagnosis of non-hemorrhagic injury of corpus callosum.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨MRI对于非出血性胼胝体损伤的诊断价值。

sentences.english: Subcortical heterotopia in 7,4 cases with callosal agenesis were accompanied.
sentences.chinese: 皮质下型7例，4例合并胼胝体发育不全。

sentences.english: GABA containing callosal neurons were also found.
sentences.chinese: 同时发现含GABA的胼胝体神经元。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the value of MRI in the diagnosis of callosal agenesis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨MRI对胼胝体发育不全的诊断价值。

sentences.english: The development of corpus callosum was affected by vision.
sentences.chinese: 胼胝体发育受视觉的影响。

definition: variant of 腳趾|脚趾[jiao3 zhi3]
